content:
That's a wonderful idea! The "Then and Now" section will be a great way to connect your own college graduation experience with your nephew's, and the captions or notes will add a personal touch to the album. By sharing your own story, you'll make the album even more special and meaningful to your nephew.

Remember to have fun with the process of creating the album, and don't hesitate to experiment with different designs, layouts, and captions until you find a look that feels right to you. And don't forget to share the album with your nephew and other family members – it's a great way to celebrate this important milestone and create a treasured family keepsake.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I wish you all the best with your album, and I'm sure it will turn out to be a beautiful and heartwarming tribute to your nephew's graduation and your family's legacy of education.
